first_para: David Leonard Watts (born 26 August 1951) is a British Labour Party politician, who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for St Helens North from 1997 to 2015, and was the Chair of the Parliamentary Labour Party between 2012 and February 2015.

full.extract: David Leonard Watts (born 26 August 1951) is a British Labour Party politician, who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for St Helens North from 1997 to 2015, and was the Chair of the Parliamentary Labour Party between 2012 and February 2015.
full.title: David Watts (politician)
